import React, { useEffect } from 'react' import {Store} from '../Store' import { useContext } from 'react' import Card from 'react-bootstrap/Card' import Container from 'react-bootstrap/esm/Container'; import CardHeader from 'react-bootstrap/esm/CardHeader'; import CardBody from 'react-bootstrap/esm/CardBody'; import ListGroupItem from 'react-bootstrap/esm/ListGroupItem'; import ListGroup from 'react-bootstrap/ListGroup'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import Row from 'react-bootstrap/esm/Row'; import Col from 'react-bootstrap/esm/Col'; import axios from 'axios' import Button from 'react-bootstrap/esm/Button'; import { useReducer } from 'react'; import LoadingBox from '../components/LoadingBox'; function reducer(action , state) { switch(action.type) { case 'order_Request': return {...state , error : false , loading : true} break; case 'req_orderFailed': return {...state , error : action.payload , loading : false} break; case 'req_orderSuccess' : return {...state , error : false , loading : false , order : action.payload} } } export default function OrderScreen() { const [{state}] = useContext(Store) const [{error , loading , order} , dispatch] = useReducer(reducer , {error : false , loading : true , order : {}}) console.log("orders yaw " , order) useEffect(()=>{ async function fetch_order() { dispatch({type:'loading'}) try{ const result = await axios.get('/api/order' , { headers : { authorization : `Bearer ${state.userinfo.token}` } }) dispatch({payload : JSON.parse(result) , type : 'req_orderSuccess'}) } catch(err) { dispatch({payload : err , type : 'req_orderFailed'}) } } fetch_order(); }, []) return ( <> {true ? :

Order {order._id}

Shipping Name :  {order.shippingAdress.fullname} Adress :  {order.shippingAdress.adress} {(!order.isDelivered) ? "Not Delivered" : " Delivered" } Payment Method :  {order.paymentMethod} {(!order.isPaid) ? "Not Paid" : "Paid" } items {/* { order.orderItems.map((x)=>{ return    {x.name}

{x.quantity}

{ x.quantity * x.price}dh

 }) } */} Edit Order Summary

Items

{order.itemsPrice}dh

Shipping

{order.shippingPrice}

Tax

{order.taxPrice}

 Order total {order.totalPrice}dh } ) }
